data.actual_result: Their discriminator is different from the one shown on their profile, even after a reload, it shows their old discriminator.
data.expected_result: Discriminator to match their actual discriminator and be the same discriminator as they have on their profile
data.short_description: [DESKTOP AND IOS!] The “find or start a conversation” feature does not show a users actual discriminator after a nitro subscription terminates
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a friend with a nitro subscription - Ensure it is not renewed and let it end - Allow the system to automatically change their discim - Use the “Find or start a conversation” feature to search them - Observe their discriminator which loads on the feature, this is next to their username - When you click on their profile observe their actual discriminator and notice the difference
